title: Eugene O'Neill National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases       Current News Releases Please note that only the latest releases will be available on this page. When the news release has expired, it will be moved to the Archive link. If you have any questions, please contact the person(s) listed on the release or you may contact the park Superintendent, who can also be reached via the Management link.           Subscribe  | What is RSS     September 06, 2015  Eugene O’Neill National Historic Site welcomes 4th Grade Students through Every Kid in a Park Initiative  Danville, CA – Eugene O’Neill National Historic Site invites all 4th grade students to visit the park as part of the White House’s new Every Kid in a Park program. Starting September 1, 2015, 4th grade students can go to www.everykidinapark.gov to complete an activity and obtain a free annual entry pass to more than 2,000 federal recreation areas, including national parks.
